Title: Establishing the time period during which to file a claim for sexual harassment against the state in cases when a complaint was filed with a state or local agency
Summary: Establishes the time period during which to file a claim for sexual harassment against the state in cases when a complaint was filed with a state or local agency.
LawCode: Amd ยง10, Ct Claims Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the court of claims act, in relation to establishing the time period during which to file a claim for sexual harassment against the state in cases when a complaint was filed with a state or local agency
